Package notes

Class Note

java.lang.Object
notes.Note
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Reversable, Versionable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ProgrammingNote, TestingNote
public class Note extends Object implements Reversable, Cloneable, Serializable
Represents a basic note with title, description, text, author, creation date, deadline and versioning functionality.
See Also:
